message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be of great value to you. While I cannot disclose the specifics of the product, I assure you it is worth no less than $1500000 to me. I am willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a significant investment, but I believe the potential return will make it worthwhile. Please consider this offer carefully and let me know your decision.
